response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by its previous owners. Given its quality and features, it's worth more than $120 to many users. Considering its true value, I'm offering it to you for $140. This price reflects the investment we've made in ensuring its high standards and the benefits it will bring to you. I believe this is a fair deal that allows you to enjoy the product while also compensating us appropriately for our efforts. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 140}
